description: This API permits filtering on the ControlId and HomeRegion fields.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: The target parameter specifies the identifier to which the home region is applied, which is always of type ACCOUNT. It applies the home region to the current ACCOUNT. The target type is always an ACCOUNT. Id (string) --- The TargetID is a 12-character identifier of the ACCOUNT for which the control was created. (This must be the current account.)

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The target type is always an ACCOUNT.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: The TargetID is a 12-character identifier of the ACCOUNT for which the control was created. (This must be the current account.)

nested_items.name: HomeRegionControls
nested_items.description: An array that contains your HomeRegionControl objects.

nested_items.name: ControlId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier that's generated for each home region control. It's always a string that begins with 'hrc-' followed by 12 lowercase letters and numbers.

nested_items.name: HomeRegion
nested_items.description: The AWS Region that's been set as home region. For example, 'us-west-2' or 'eu-central-1' are valid home regions.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The target type is always an ACCOUNT.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The TargetID is a 12-character identifier of the ACCOUNT for which the control was created. (This must be the current account.)

nested_items.name: RequestedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp representing the time when the customer called CreateHomeregionControl and set the home region for the account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If a NextToken was returned by a previous call, more results are available. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token in NextToken.
